review: Amazon Fire TV has exceeded our expectations!!  We love everything about it, the ease of use, voice activation and subtitles which we did not have running Amazon through our smart TV.  Another bonus is the ability to start streaming a show on my Kindle Fire HDX, pause it and continue it on our TV.  We would highly recommend this product to others.

review: I have learned over the years that in order to get exactly what you want for Christmas you should just buy it yourself, so I did. I purchased the Amazon FireTV box and I've got to say this thing is awesome! All of my steaming apps in one place, Amazon Prime, Netflix and huluplus. In addition to that, I can cast things from my iphone apps to play on my TV, like Iheart radio, Spotify, YouTube and many more! Also it hooked up to my Bose home theater system too! I am so very happy with this purchase! Suck it TimeWarner Cable, who needs you? Very very happy with this purchase!!!!
